title: [OOC] New Discussion and Comment Character Limits
body:
Hi All,

Since the pain was likely felt acutely by the crew here, I wanted to post on this Board first with an update to the Discussion and Comment Character limits. 

As of now, we have removed character limits from Discussions (creation of) and doubled the character limit on comments. The Boards team will continue to monitor and take feedback to see how the change feels going forward. 

{{summoner:12}}
